attributes.action: Change the street lights back to orange
attributes.background: I want the government to change the street lights back to an orange tone as orange or amber lights are less harsh on the eyes and also improves visibility in adverse weather conditions. I also think the orange lights have a more comforting feel and overall orange lights generate less light pollution

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about lighting on local roads and streets are a matter for local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
